attributes.action: KEEP PETER SUTTCLIFFE IN BROADMOOR FOR THE REST OF HIS LIFE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Suttcliffe's doctors are saying as long as he continues taking his drugs he will be ok to be freed. What about if Suttcliffe stops taking his drugs???
For the amount of murders he's commited life must mean life!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
